argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | opelopaba.1 | |- A e. _V |
| 2 |  | opelopaba.2 | |- B e. _V |
| 3 |  | opelopaba.3 | |- ( ( x = A /\ y = B ) -> ( ph <-> ps ) ) |
| 4 |  | braba.4 | |- R = { <. x , y >. | ph } |
| 5 | 3, 4 | #P_brabga | |- ( ( A e. _V /\ B e. _V ) -> ( A R B <-> ps ) ) |
| 6 | 1, 2, 5 | #P_mp2an | |- ( A R B <-> ps ) |
